commentText: Prior to the fix for SPR-8761, this test threw because the nested MyComponent_annotation was being falsely considered as a 'lite' Configuration class candidate.
codeText: @Test_	public void repro() {_		AnnotationConfigApplicationContext ctx = new AnnotationConfigApplicationContext()__		ctx.scan(getClass().getPackage().getName())__		ctx.refresh()__		assertThat(ctx.containsBean("withNestedAnnotation"), is(true))__	}
